What are the treatments for Dyggve-Melchior-Clausen syndrome ?,"How might Dyggve-Melchior-Clausen syndrome be treated? Treatment of individuals with DMC syndrome depends on the affected person's symptoms and is usually supportive. There is no cure for this condition.
